story_sentences.korean: 그 적 조직은 실패에 <word id='_intolerant' class='word-target-kr'>편협한</word> 것으로 알려져 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Despite the high stakes, Thorne remained a <word id='_kind' class='word-eng-link'>kind</word> and compassionate leader to his team.
story_sentences.korean: 높은 판돈에도 불구하고, 쏜은 그의 팀에게 <word id='_kind' class='word-target-kr'>친절한</word>하고 인정 많은 리더로 남았다.

story_sentences.english: He knew there was a <word id='_limit' class='word-eng-link'>limit</word> to how much pressure Evans could handle.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 에반스가 감당할 수 있는 압박의 <word id='_limit' class='word-target-kr'>경계, 한계</word>가 있다는 것을 알았다.

story_sentences.english: The agency had to <word id='_limit' class='word-eng-link'>limit</word> Evans's access to sensitive files during this time.
story_sentences.korean: 기관은 이 기간 동안 에반스의 민감한 파일 접근을 <word id='_limit' class='word-target-kr'>제한하다</word>야 했다.

story_sentences.english: The operation was running on a razor-thin <word id='_margin' class='word-eng-link'>margin</word> of error.
story_sentences.korean: 그 작전은 아주 얇은 오차의 <word id='_margin' class='word-target-kr'>가장자리</word> 위에서 진행되고 있었다.

story_sentences.english: The enemy was not a formal army but a well-funded <word id='_militia' class='word-eng-link'>militia</word> with advanced technology.
story_sentences.korean: 적은 정규군이 아니라 첨단 기술을 갖춘 자금이 풍부한 <word id='_militia' class='word-target-kr'>시민군</word>이었다.

story_sentences.english: <word id='_moreover' class='word-eng-link'>moreover</word>, they had insiders in several governments.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_moreover' class='word-target-kr'>게다가</word>, 그들은 여러 정부에 내부자들을 두고 있었다.

story_sentences.english: It was <word id='_necessary' class='word-eng-link'>necessary</word> to act quickly before the militia could move their lab.
story_sentences.korean: 시민군이 실험실을 옮기기 전에 신속하게 행동하는 것이 <word id='_necessary' class='word-target-kr'>필수적인</word>이었다.

story_sentences.english: Thorne's plan was to <word id='_obstruct' class='word-eng-link'>obstruct</word> their escape route while the main team secured the asset.
story_sentences.korean: 쏜의 계획은 주팀이 자산을 확보하는 동안 그들의 탈출로를 <word id='_obstruct' class='word-target-kr'>막다</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Evans had to make a decision <word id='_on_the_spot' class='word-eng-link'>on the spot</word> when his contact changed the meeting location.
story_sentences.korean: 접선책이 만남의 장소를 변경했을 때 에반스는 <word id='_on_the_spot' class='word-target-kr'>즉시</word> 결정을 내려야 했다.

story_sentences.english: Thorne worried that Evans might still be <word id='_partial' class='word-eng-link'>partial</word> to his former allies.
story_sentences.korean: 쏜은 에반스가 여전히 그의 이전 동맹들에게 <word id='_partial' class='word-target-kr'>편파적인</word>일 수 있다고 걱정했다.

story_sentences.english: Evans sent a <word id='_petition' class='word-eng-link'>petition</word> through his lawyer, asking for protection for his family.
story_sentences.korean: 에반스는 변호사를 통해 가족 보호를 요청하는 <word id='_petition' class='word-target-kr'>간청하다</word>서를 보냈다.

story_sentences.english: The safe house was located by a <word id='_placid' class='word-eng-link'>placid</word> lake, a stark contrast to the turbulent situation.
story_sentences.korean: 안전 가옥은 <word id='_placid' class='word-target-kr'>평온한</word> 호숫가에 위치해 있어, 격동적인 상황과 극명한 대조를 이루었다.

story_sentences.english: The cave they used as a headquarters had a high <word id='_porosity' class='word-eng-link'>porosity</word>, making it damp and cold.
story_sentences.korean: 그들이 본부로 사용했던 동굴은 <word id='_porosity' class='word-target-kr'>다공성</word>이 높아 축축하고 추웠다.

story_sentences.english: Thorne hoped to <word id='_reform' class='word-eng-link'>reform</word> the agency's protocols after this crisis was over.
story_sentences.korean: 쏜은 이 위기가 끝난 후 기관의 규약을 <word id='_reform' class='word-target-kr'>개정하다</word>기를 바랐다.

story_sentences.english: The militia's leader was known for his <word id='_rigid' class='word-eng-link'>rigid</word> ideology and refusal to negotiate.
story_sentences.korean: 그 시민군의 지도자는 그의 <word id='_rigid' class='word-target-kr'>엄격한</word> 이념과 협상 거부로 알려져 있었다.

story_sentences.english: His plans were always <word id='_rigid' class='word-eng-link'>rigid</word> and inflexible, which was a weakness Thorne could exploit.
story_sentences.korean: 그의 계획은 항상 <word id='_rigid' class='word-target-kr'>단단한</word>하고 융통성이 없었으며, 이는 쏜이 이용할 수 있는 약점이었다.

story_sentences.english: Thorne was ready to <word id='_blame' class='word-eng-link'>blame</word> himself if the plan failed, but he wouldn't show it.
story_sentences.korean: 쏜은 계획이 실패하면 자신을 <word id='_blame' class='word-target-kr'>비난하다</word> 준비가 되어 있었지만, 티를 내지는 않을 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: The enemy's command center was <word id='_chaotic' class='word-eng-link'>chaotic</word> after Evans fed them false information.
story_sentences.korean: 에반스가 그들에게 거짓 정보를 흘린 후 적의 지휘 본부는 <word id='_chaotic' class='word-target-kr'>무질서한</word> 상태였다.

story_sentences.english: It was difficult to <word id='_comprehend' class='word-eng-link'>comprehend</word> the full extent of their network.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 네트워크 전체 범위를 <word id='_comprehend' class='word-target-kr'>이해하다</word> 것은 어려웠다.

story_sentences.english: Rescuing the captured scientists would be a <word id='_creditable' class='word-eng-link'>creditable</word> achievement for the agency.
story_sentences.korean: 포로로 잡힌 과학자들을 구출하는 것은 기관에게 <word id='_creditable' class='word-target-kr'>명예로운</word> 업적이 될 것이다.

story_sentences.english: Thorne's stance was <word id='_decided' class='word-eng-link'>decided</word>; there would be no negotiation with the terrorists.
story_sentences.korean: 쏜의 입장은 <word id='_decided' class='word-target-kr'>단호한</word>했다; 테러리스트들과의 협상은 없을 것이다.

story_sentences.english: Their primary goal was to <word id='_displace' class='word-eng-link'>displace</word> the militia from their mountain fortress.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 주요 목표는 산악 요새에서 시민군을 <word id='_displace' class='word-target-kr'>대체하다</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: The plan was to <word id='_enclose' class='word-eng-link'>enclose</word> the entire area and cut off all escape.
story_sentences.korean: 계획은 전체 지역을 <word id='_enclose' class='word-target-kr'>에워싸다</word>고 모든 탈출로를 차단하는 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Such a large-scale operation would <word id='_entail' class='word-eng-link'>entail</word> significant risks.
story_sentences.korean: 그렇게 대규모의 작전은 상당한 위험을 <word id='_entail' class='word-target-kr'>-을 수반하다</word> 것이다.

story_sentences.english: Thorne had to <word id='_excel' class='word-eng-link'>excel</word> in strategy to outsmart his opponent.
story_sentences.korean: 쏜은 상대를 압도하기 위해 전략에서 <word id='_excel' class='word-target-kr'>능가하다, 빼어나다</word>야 했다.

story_sentences.english: This wasn't a typical military operation; it belonged to a different <word id='_genre' class='word-eng-link'>genre</word> of conflict entirely.
story_sentences.korean: 이것은 전형적인 군사 작전이 아니었다; 그것은 완전히 다른 <word id='_genre' class='word-target-kr'>유형</word>의 충돌에 속했다.

story_sentences.english: Maps and satellite images helped to <word id='_illustrate' class='word-eng-link'>illustrate</word> the complexity of the fortress.
story_sentences.korean: 지도와 위성 사진은 요새의 복잡성을 <word id='_illustrate' class='word-target-kr'>설명하다</word> 데 도움이 되었다.

story_sentences.english: The enemy had built a sophisticated <word id='_infrastructure' class='word-eng-link'>infrastructure</word> deep inside the mountain.
story_sentences.korean: 적은 산 깊숙한 곳에 정교한 <word id='_infrastructure' class='word-target-kr'>하부구조</word>를 구축했다.

story_sentences.english: The agency's rules <word id='_inhibit' class='word-eng-link'>inhibit</word> direct engagement without presidential approval.
story_sentences.korean: 기관의 규정은 대통령의 승인 없이는 직접적인 교전을 <word id='_inhibit' class='word-target-kr'>금지하다</word>다.

story_sentences.english: The rescue mission would <word id='_involve' class='word-eng-link'>involve</word> a team of ten elite specialists.
story_sentences.korean: 구출 임무는 10명의 정예 전문가 팀을 <word id='_involve' class='word-target-kr'>-을 수반하다</word> 것이다.

story_sentences.english: The enemy used a front company to <word id='_lease' class='word-eng-link'>lease</word> the land from the local government.
story_sentences.korean: 적은 위장 회사를 이용해 지방 정부로부터 땅을 <word id='_lease' class='word-target-kr'>임대하다</word>했다.

story_sentences.english: Thorne prepared his team; <word id='_likewise' class='word-eng-link'>likewise</word>, the support crews readied the aircraft.
story_sentences.korean: 쏜은 그의 팀을 준비시켰다; <word id='_likewise' class='word-target-kr'>마찬가지로, 또한</word>, 지원 인력들은 항공기를 준비했다.

story_sentences.english: Their window of opportunity was extremely <word id='_limited' class='word-eng-link'>limited</word>.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 기회의 창은 극도로 <word id='_limited' class='word-target-kr'>제한된</word>이었다.

story_sentences.english: The tracking device was designed to <word id='_lodge_in' class='word-eng-link'>lodge in</word> the sole of a target's shoe.
story_sentences.korean: 추적 장치는 목표물의 신발 밑창에 <word id='_lodge_in' class='word-target-kr'>박다, 꽂아 넣다</word>도록 설계되었다.

story_sentences.english: During the infiltration, the agents had to <word id='_mingle' class='word-eng-link'>mingle</word> with the workers at a nearby mining camp.
story_sentences.korean: 잠입하는 동안, 요원들은 근처 광산 캠프의 노동자들과 <word id='_mingle' class='word-target-kr'>섞다</word>야 했다.

story_sentences.english: Every agent has an <word id='_obligation' class='word-eng-link'>obligation</word> to protect national security, no matter the cost.
story_sentences.korean: 모든 요원은 어떤 대가를 치르더라도 국가 안보를 보호할 <word id='_obligation' class='word-target-kr'>의무</word>가 있다.

story_sentences.english: Circumstances would <word id='_oblige' class='word-eng-link'>oblige</word> Thorne to make a difficult choice.
story_sentences.korean: 상황은 쏜에게 어려운 선택을 하도록 <word id='_oblige' class='word-target-kr'>강요하다</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: He had to <word id='_offer' class='word-eng-link'>offer</word> himself as bait to draw out the leader.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 지도자를 끌어내기 위해 자신을 미끼로 <word id='_offer' class='word-target-kr'>제공하다</word>야 했다.

story_sentences.english: <word id='_on_occasion' class='word-eng-link'>on occasion</word>, he wondered if he would survive this mission.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_on_occasion' class='word-target-kr'>가끔</word>, 그는 이 임무에서 살아남을 수 있을지 궁금했다.

story_sentences.english: His instincts told him to <word id='_oppose' class='word-eng-link'>oppose</word> the plan, but he had no other choice.
story_sentences.korean: 그의 본능은 그 계획에 <word id='_oppose' class='word-target-kr'>반대하다</word>라고 말했지만, 다른 선택지가 없었다.

story_sentences.english: The team had to <word id='_pare' class='word-eng-link'>pare</word> down their equipment to the bare essentials for the climb.
story_sentences.korean: 팀은 등반을 위해 장비를 필수품만 남기고 <word id='_pare' class='word-target-kr'>껍질을 벗기다, 삭감하다</word>야 했다.

story_sentences.english: The mission was filled with <word id='_peril' class='word-eng-link'>peril</word> at every turn.
story_sentences.korean: 그 임무는 매 순간 <word id='_peril' class='word-target-kr'>위기</word>로 가득 차 있었다.

story_sentences.english: The enemy combatants were <word id='_predominately' class='word-eng-link'>predominately</word> ex-special forces.
story_sentences.korean: 적 전투원들은 <word id='_predominately' class='word-target-kr'>주로</word> 전직 특수부대 출신이었다.

story_sentences.english: The intense heat from the desert floor would <word id='_refract' class='word-eng-link'>refract</word> the light, making it hard to see.
story_sentences.korean: 사막 바닥의 강렬한 열기는 빛을 <word id='_refract' class='word-target-kr'>굴절시키다</word>여 시야를 어렵게 만들 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: His job was to <word id='_render' class='word-eng-link'>render</word> the enemy's air defense system useless.
story_sentences.korean: 그의 임무는 적의 방공 시스템을 쓸모없게 <word id='_render' class='word-target-kr'>-을 표현하다</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: The agency promised to <word id='_render' class='word-eng-link'>render</word> all necessary aid to his family if he didn't return.
story_sentences.korean: 기관은 그가 돌아오지 않을 경우 그의 가족에게 필요한 모든 도움을 <word id='_render' class='word-target-kr'>주다</word>고 약속했다.

story_sentences.english: Thorne wasn't interested in <word id='_renown' class='word-eng-link'>renown</word>; he only cared about the mission's success.
story_sentences.korean: 쏜은 <word id='_renown' class='word-target-kr'>명성</word>에는 관심이 없었다; 그는 오직 임무의 성공에만 신경 썼다.

story_sentences.english: The fortress's automated defenses were designed to <word id='_repel' class='word-eng-link'>repel</word> any unauthorized approach.
story_sentences.korean: 요새의 자동 방어 시스템은 어떠한 무단 접근도 <word id='_repel' class='word-target-kr'>물리치다</word>도록 설계되었다.

story_sentences.english: After the mission, he would need time to <word id='_restore' class='word-eng-link'>restore</word> his health and mind.
story_sentences.korean: 임무가 끝난 후, 그는 자신의 건강과 마음을 <word id='_restore' class='word-target-kr'>복구하다</word>할 시간이 필요할 것이다.

story_sentences.english: The enemy lab's lack of proper <word id='_sanitation' class='word-eng-link'>sanitation</word> was appalling and dangerous.
story_sentences.korean: 적 실험실의 적절한 <word id='_sanitation' class='word-target-kr'>공중위생</word>의 부재는 끔찍하고 위험했다.

story_sentences.english: He did not <word id='_savor' class='word-eng-link'>savor</word> the moment of victory, only the relief that it was over.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 승리의 순간을 <word id='_savor' class='word-target-kr'>맛</word>보지 않고, 그것이 끝났다는 안도감만을 느꼈다.

story_sentences.english: The team had to <word id='_spare' class='word-eng-link'>spare</word> no expense to acquire the needed technology.
story_sentences.korean: 팀은 필요한 기술을 얻기 위해 비용을 <word id='_spare' class='word-target-kr'>절약하다</word>해서는 안 되었다.

story_sentences.english: He asked the tech chief if she could <word id='_spare' class='word-eng-link'>spare</word> a moment to look at the code.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 기술팀장에게 코드를 살펴볼 시간을 <word id='_spare' class='word-target-kr'>주다, (시간을) 할애하다</word> 수 있는지 물었다.

story_sentences.english: The cool night air was <word id='_stimulating' class='word-eng-link'>stimulating</word> after hours in the stuffy command van.
story_sentences.korean: 답답한 지휘 밴에서 몇 시간 보낸 후 시원한 밤공기는 <word id='_stimulating' class='word-target-kr'>활기(자극)를 주는</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: The leader's actions <word id='_typify' class='word-eng-link'>typify</word> the fanaticism of the entire group.
story_sentences.korean: 지도자의 행동은 그룹 전체의 광신주의를 <word id='_typify' class='word-target-kr'>대표하다</word>다.

story_sentences.english: The final assault was a <word id='_wholesale' class='word-eng-link'>wholesale</word> attack on the enemy's compound.
story_sentences.korean: 최종 공격은 적의 부지에 대한 <word id='_wholesale' class='word-target-kr'>대규모의</word> 공격이었다.

story_sentences.english: They had won the battle, <word id='_yet' class='word-eng-link'>yet</word> Thorne felt the war was far from over.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 전투에서 이겼다, <word id='_yet' class='word-target-kr'>그럼에도 불구하고</word> 쏜은 전쟁이 끝나려면 멀었다고 느꼈다.
